channel.title: Mopar help
channel.description: i needto learn how to spawn objcts anywhere i need them

item.title: Mopar help
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Search in your client.java for public void NewObjects() { AddGlobalObject(2957, 3692, 2488, -3, 10);//rune Altar

and follow that code with new lines right underneath

So it should look like this

public void NewObjects() { AddGlobalObject(2957, 3692, 2488, -3, 10);//rune Altar makeGlobalObject(2957, 3692, 2488, -3, 10);//Rune Altar AddGlobalObject(3245, 3611, 823, 0, 10);//Dummy1 makeGlobalObject(3245, 3611, 823, 0, 10);//Dummy1 AddGlobalObject(3244, 3609, 300, -1, 10);//haystack makeGlobalObject(3244, 3609, 300, -1, 10);//haystack AddGlobalObject(3239, 3604, 299, 0, 10);//Hay1 makeGlobalObject(3239, 3604, 299, 0, 10);//Hay1

Read full topic
